title: Pepperoni Swirl Bread
ingredients: ['1 (500g) packet bread mix', '350ml warm water or as needed', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 tablespoon dried basil leaves', '1/2 tablespoon dried onion flakes', '1/2 tablespoon dried oregano', '225g sliced pepperoni sausage', '175g grated mozzarella cheese', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
